content: in the version history "4.6.0 Draft Ballot for R5 - May 2020 Ballot (Apr 14-20 2020). Significant changes: is listed". The CI build is also numbered 4.6.0. Is there a version to use for building an IG to reference the build that was current at the time of the ballot?
Is the question how to create an IG that based on a particular R5 ballot version?
The question is, when you refer to 4.6.0, are you going to get the CI-build release or the May ballot snapshot?
I thought the version would be bumped for each ballot?
It was bumped for the ballot. It just wasn't bumped after
